alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Escambia; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:17PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe, north central Escambia and central Conecuh Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 117 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of I65 And US 84, or 7 miles west of Evergreen, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Evergreen, Peterman, Castleberry and I65 And US 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
